description: Generate Trigger Disable and Enable Commands for Currently Enabled Triggers Only.
body:
/* =================================================================================================
-- Server		: LOCALSERVER
-- Database		: User Database
-- Script		: GenerateTriggerDisableAndEnableCommands
-- Description	: Generate Trigger Disable and Enable Commands for Currently Enabled Triggers Only.
================================================================================================= */
SELECT SCH.name AS "SchemaName", --OBJECT_SCHEMA_NAME(TR.parent_id)
	   TBL.name AS "TableName", --OBJECT_NAME(TR.parent_id)
	   TR.name AS "TriggerName",
	   TR.is_ms_shipped AS "IsMSshipped?",
	   CASE TR.is_disabled WHEN 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS "IsEnabled?",
	   TR.is_not_for_replication AS "IsNotForReplication?",
	   TR.is_instead_of_trigger AS "IsInsteadOfTrigger?",
	   CASE WHEN TR.is_disabled = 0 THEN 'ALTER TABLE ' + QUOTENAME(SCH.name) + '.' + QUOTENAME(TBL.name) + ' DISABLE TRIGGER ' + QUOTENAME(TR.name) + ';' ELSE '' END AS "DisableTriggerCMD",
	   CASE WHEN TR.is_disabled = 0 THEN 'ALTER TABLE ' + QUOTENAME(SCH.name) + '.' + QUOTENAME(TBL.name) + ' ENABLE TRIGGER ' + QUOTENAME(TR.name) + ';' ELSE '' END AS "EnableTriggerCMD"
FROM sys.triggers AS TR
INNER JOIN sys.tables AS TBL ON TBL.object_id = TR.parent_id
INNER JOIN sys.schemas AS SCH ON SCH.schema_id = TBL.schema_id
WHERE 1 = 1
	--AND SCH.name = ''
	--AND TBL.name = ''
	--AND TR.name = '';
